name: What Da Puck!?
description:
Decided to share with Itch community my never-published anywhere, pretty wacky game that was sitting and collecting some dust.

There are 4 levels, however I've shared only one.
Will do it gradually ;)
Relentlessly curious on the feedback from itch fellas.

Ok, let's get to the game:

The idea of this level is to hit the referee as much as you can with the bottle.
Use mouse to aim. 
On touch screens you can aim with the touch-joystick that appears upon touching screen.

I hope some of you will enjoy this little game.

I might add the multiplayer mode to the game and publish it here - https://playchap.io
